chunk: Delicious dhal recipe A great dish to introduce your baby to mild spices and lentils. Age: 6 months or older Prep: 5 mins Cook: 30 mins Portions: 8 Ingredients - Half medium onion, peeled - 2 to 3 sprigs (5g) fresh coriander - 65g yellow split peas - 1 tbsp vegetable oil - Half tsp garlic puree - Half tsp chilli powder - Half tsp ground turmeric - 2 tbsp water Method Chop the onion and coriander. Boil the split peas until tender and then drain (approx 20 to 30 minutes). Heat the oil in a pan, add the onions, garlic purée, chilli powder and turmeric – cook for 3 to 4 minutes until the onions start to soften. Add the cooked split peas and water to the pan, simmer for 5 minutes – add a little extra water if needed. Sprinkle with coriander then blend or mash until smooth
title: Delicious Dhal
description: A great dish to introduce your baby to mild spices and lentils.

chunk: the cooked split peas and water to the pan, simmer for 5 minutes – add a little extra water if needed. Sprinkle with coriander then blend or mash until smooth (but with soft lumps). Serve 1 portion in a bowl with a spoon. Information: Try serving with rice to introduce a new texture to your baby. More in recipe and meal ideas
title: Delicious Dhal
description: A great dish to introduce your baby to mild spices and lentils.
